titleStmt.title: The parable of the black-bird[s] and the magpie vindicated
titleStmt.author: Thompkins, Edward.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Thompkins--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
An allegory on the history of England from the reign of Charles I to the accession of William III.
Imperfect: tightly bound. Huntington Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
